AccessPolicy.description: An access policy to associate with the current access entry.

PolicyArn.description: The ARN of the access policy to add to the access entry.

AccessScope.description: The access scope of the access policy.

Namespaces.description: The namespaces to associate with the access scope. Only specify if Type is set to 'namespace'.

Type.description: The type of the access scope.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

description: An object representing an Amazon EKS AccessEntry.

AccessEntryArn.description: The ARN of the access entry.

AccessPolicies.description: An array of access policies that are associated with the access entry.

ClusterName.description: The cluster that the access entry is created for.

KubernetesGroups.description: The Kubernetes groups that the access entry is associated with.

PrincipalArn.description: The principal ARN that the access entry is created for.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

Type.description: The node type to associate with the access entry.

Username.description: The Kubernetes user that the access entry is associated with.
